plugins.name: Ruyi Design Assistant - 如意设计助手
plugins.description:
Ruyi Design Assistant helps you efficiently use React component libraries and Design Tokens for design in Figma, conveniently obtain resources from open source icon libraries, and easily get production-level component code.


Component library: Design with the same code component library used by developers to build products. Simply drag and drop components and configure component properties to creat standardized visual representations.


Design Tokens: Easily view and use design system themes in Figma, with one-click quick switching of component themes.


Icon Plaza: The assistant connects to massive and popular open source icon libraries. Drag and drop icons to generate vector layer.


Code inspection: The assistant can accurately check every component code, component property value, and Design Token value used in the design file, eliminating the need to consult documentation outside the design tool and reducing translation deviation during the design-to-product process.


Learn more about plugin usage.


------


如意设计助手，助您在 Figma 中高效使用 React 组件库与 Design Tokens 做设计，便捷获取开源图标库资源，轻松获取生产级组件代码。


组件库：使用与开发者构建产品相同的代码组件库做设计，简单拖拽组件和配置组件属性即可获得规范化的视觉表现。


Design Tokens：轻松查看设计系统设计主题、一键切换组件主题生成对应主题的 figma 设计资源。


图标广场：助手连接海量流行的开源图标库素材。一键拖拽，生成矢量设计资源，助力设计提效。


代码检查：助手可以精准检查出设计稿中使用的每一个组件代码、组件属性值以及 Design Token值，无需跳出设计工具去查阅说明文档，减少设计转变为产品过程中的转译偏差。


了解更多插件使用方法

plugins.name: Docfy Design
plugins.description:
Documente processos de design de forma a torná-los entregáveis autoconsumíveis.


O Docfy é um plugin que possibilita times design a implementarem uma estrutura de documentação única, consistente e escalável.


Em uma BU, Tribo e, às vezes, dentro de uma mesma squad, de designer para designer, falhamos em manter um sistema consistente, único e escalável de se documentar processos dentro do time de design, com entregáveis, vezes pouco interpretáveis, inconclusivos, inconsistentes, que geram descrença na relevância e valor dos processos de design, o que torna o ato de se compartilhar a informação oneroso tanto para quem a busca quanto para quem simplesmente a transmite. Como time, precisamos ter capacidade de encontrar formas para capturar, arquivar, pesquisar e compartilhar o conhecimento de maneira a melhorar a produtividade individual.


Encare sua Documentação como um Produto®

Pense em uma documentação como um produto, que será consumido por um grupo específico usuários (Designers, DEVs, PMs, líderes funcionais, de entrega, stakeholders), e estes, usam este produto tanto de forma estratégica, para tomada de decisão, quanto de forma tática, na priorização, backlog, handoff para o desenvolvimento.


Nesse sentido, como tem sido a experiência do que você consome e como está a experiência do que você entrega, qual o nível de autonomia e satisfação na utilização deste produto? Qual foi sua experiência ao ter que dar continuidade ou ainda, em onboarding, precisar entender um projeto a partir da documentação de um outro designer?


Document Design System

A ausência de um sistema consistente, único e escalável de se documentar processos dentro do time, Não é sobre uma "Templatização" de processos, o propósito está no entendimento sobre o valor de se manter a responsabilidade de se documentar processos de maneira a criar materiais de fácil leitura e interpretação, descentralizando a informação.


Uso

Use o Docfy Design Plug-in clicando em ”Try it out”, ao criar um “New Design File” no Figma, iniciando um novo projeto, execute o plug-in para que seja configurado uma estrutura de documentação padrão com diversos templates e tutoriais com boas práticas. (o Plug-in criará uma estrutura páginas e removerá a ”Page 1” padrão no arquivo do Figma)

accepted.name: Docfy Design
accepted.description: O Docfy é um plugin que possibilita times design a implementarem uma estrutura de documentação única, consistente e escalável.

plugins.tagline: Use uma estrutura de documentação única, consistente e escalável.

plugins.name: Scribble Pal
plugins.description:
Scribble Pal is especially made for iPad with Apple Pencil.


Create new stickies with text, as well as modify text on a selected sticky, shape or text box. The large text writing area works with either a keyboard or Apple Pencil with Scribble enabled.


Use "Set Anchor" on an existing sticky, shape or text box to set it as the origin point for additional stickies you want to add.


Important Notes: Updating text in stickies and shapes with mixed styles (e.g. multiple fonts, underline) will remove all prior formatting. Also, this plugin will not work with Figurative; that app does not support Scribble. Instead, use Safari on iPad or the Figma iPadOS app (for FigJam files).

accepted.name: Nelson Taruc
accepted.description: My design philosophy: Focus. Boost signal, kill noise. Solve the first problem. Embrace uncertainty.

plugins.name: Import Google Sheets (For Variables)
plugins.description:
Import Google Sheets (For Variables)


A plugin that allows you to import Google Sheets into a Figma collection (variables). Supports synchronization to multiple modes, not just single mode.


View the code on GitHub


Google Sheets API


https://sheets.googleapis.com/v4/spreadsheets/${SHEET_ID}/values/${RANGE}?key=${TOKEN}


To create an API URL


  1. open the Google Sheets you want to synchronize with Figma.
  2. click the "Share" button in the top right corner, and select "Everyone with the link" from the general access.
  3. Get the ${SHEET_ID} of the Google Sheets link in your browser's address bar.
  4. Set ${TOKEN} by issuing an authorization token in Google Cloud Manager settings. (https://admin.google.com)
  5. Set the scope for the rest of the data except for the columns (e.g. A2:D).
  6. set ${RANGE} to a string that is the sum of the sheet name and the above range.


Sample URL


https://sheets.googleapis.com/v4/spreadsheets/1iYOtMl4nqwtEgBWq4_B0EcIoSB5bc77OOhPzsm79nIc/values/Sheet1!A2:D?key=AIzaSyA5xA59tkljcFItKX3JDhJ6Dr-Ng8_PmVk


Set up the rest


  1. Enter a name for the collection. If the collection exists, delete it and add it again.
  2. Except for the variable names, describe the modes (columns) separated by commas.
plugins.tagline: Synchronize from Google Sheets to Figma Variables (i18n messages, other properties, etc)

plugins.name: Ghost Legacy
plugins.description:
Ghost is a lightweight plugin that converts high fidelity mockups to loading or “skeleton” screens.


Ghost Legacy is a fork of the original Ghost plugin created by @ckark with more features.


How it Works

Ghost Legacy replaces text and shape layers in a design with rectangles while preserving their dimensions. It removes the original layers and eliminates auto-layout to avoid anomalies when inserting children into frames, ensuring a faithful layout reproduction.


Test with [Try out] button


*Note: unpredictable things can happen with designs involving complex structures.


What’s new:

  • add new parameters with custom color support (Hex, Color name)
  • figjam friendly
  • documentation
  • minor bug fixes


Open source:

https://github.com/mrstev3n/ghost-legacy

plugins.name: Swift Package Exporter
plugins.description:
Generate SwiftUI from your design tokens and export as package. Once included in Xcode, developers will have access to design tokens directly through Xcode's editor and code complete.


To get started install the plugin and run it on this sample file.


  • Demo video
  • Getting started video


Learn more: https://figmatoswift.com


👉 Supported Styles

Styles defined in your document will be automatically recognized by the plugin including:


  • ✅ Text
  • ✅ Solid Colors
  • ✅ Linear Gradients
  • ✅ Angular Gradients
  • ✅ Drop Shadows
  • ✅ Layer Blurs
  • ✅ Grid styles


* Radial and diamond gradients are not currently supported.

* Inner shadow and background blur are not currently supported.


👉 Images

Requirements for adding images to Swift package:

  • Only vector images are supported
  • Images must be defined as components
  • Images must be wrapped in a frame named Images.swift


👉 Adding the Package to Xcode

  1. Unzip the exported file and drag the entire DesignSystem folder into the Xcode project navigator right below the project name.
  2. Add the DesignSystem package to Frameworks, Libraries and Embedded Content inside your projects general settings.
  3. Import the DesignSystem module in any views that you want to use design tokens with import DesignSystem


👉 Example Usage

  • .font(Font.DesignSystem.headline1)
  • .foregroundColor(Color.DesignSystem.primary)
  • .modifier(Effect.DesignSystem.Elevation1())
  • .padding(Spacing.DesignSystem.xSmall4)
  • Image.DesignSystem.welcome


👉 FAQs & Known Issues

  • Style names that contain numbers can sometimes cause issues in Xcode. For ex "blue/1" and "blue/-1" will cause an error)
  • Apple docs on adding custom fonts to Xcode
  • The Mac App Store version of Xcode has a bug that prevents packages from working. Download Xcode directly from Apple's Developer site to resolve. Apple Developer Site


Feedback and Support

  • For more information please visit: http://figmatoswift.com
  • For feedback, questions or support please reach out on Twitter or Email

accepted.name: Todd Hamilton
accepted.description: Product Designer @Meta

plugins.tagline: Generate SwiftUI from your design tokens.

plugins.name: Aks - LTR to RTL
plugins.description:
Are you tired of dealing with two different versions (RTL and LTR) of your design at the same time? we have got your back! with Aks you can easily assign the translation to the text and convert the whole layout from LTR to RTL with one click!


The tool is specially designed for Urdu, Arabic, Persian, and other RTL languages.


Get your job done in three simple steps:


  1. Select the text and assign font and translation.
  2. Select and mark "Do not flip" to non-symmetrical elements.
  3. Select the main frame, and simply click the "Convert" button.


We promise it is as easy as it sounds :)

Figma to HTML Made Simple

ThemeBuilder automates the generation of HTML and SASS/CSS variables, including colors, typography, and other design tokens, directly from your Figma design files. Looking for an easier way to design for different screen sizes and devices? Look no further than the Viewport Area Calculator plugin! This powerful tool is perfect for designers and developers who want to optimize their websites quickly and accurately, all within the Figma design environment.


With the Viewport Size Calculator, you'll get a range of helpful features that make the design process smoother and more efficient. You can select the operating system, browser, and theme, and the plugin will factor in the dimensions of those interface elements to calculate the appropriate viewport size. plugins.name: Component Relinker
plugins.description:
The basic problem is this:

You have a workspace with components being linked across files within the workspace. You now want to migrate your files to a different workspace, but in the process, you find that the instances of components reference their root definitions from the old workspace.


This plugin works to solve that problem by, well, relinking the components.


Follow the below steps to get it working:

  • First off, you need to make sure that your new workspace is on the Professional plan (or above)
  • Go to the file in the new workspace that holds the component definitions. a) We run our plugin, and press the button called "Select Library". b) We publish all components within this file.
  • Next, we go to the file which holds our component instances (currently they are linking back to the old workspace). We run the plugin, and a) In the dropdown, select the name of the file that holds the root definitions b) Press the button called "Relink Components"


And there it is. The plugin may take a few minutes to link the components up.

plugins.name: Detach Selected Instances
plugins.description:
Detach all instances in the selected objects.

They include child and grandchild objects.


How to use

  1. Select all the objects you want to "Detach Instance".
  2. Execute this plugin.


Notice

  • Components cannot be detached.
  • This operation is the same as the following.
  1. Ctrl + Alt + B / Option + Command + B ("Detach Instance")
  2. Enter (Select all child objects)
  3. Ctrl + Alt + B / Option + Command + B ("Detach Instance")

　　…

=============================================


選択した要素内にあるインスタンスを全て解除します。

選択した要素とその子要素、孫要素のインスタンスも全て解除します。


使い方

  1. "Detach Instance（インスタンスの切り離し）"したい要素を全て選択します。
  2. 本プラグインを実行します。


注意

  • コンポーネントは解除できません。
  • Figma上で下記の操作を行った場合と同じ動作を行います。
  1. Ctrl + Alt + B / Option + Command + B （"Detach Instance（インスタンスの切り離し）"）
  2. Enter （子要素を全て選択）
  3. Ctrl + Alt + B / Option + Command + B（"Detach Instance（インスタンスの切り離し）"）

　　…

plugins.name: Figma to Streamlit
plugins.description:
A plugin to generate st. commands with their corresponding parameters and values, based on the components from our existing Figma Design System.


How to use it:

This plugin is complementary to our official Design System library, so make sure you grab a copy of it as well.

  1. After you’ve copied our design system file, select a component instance, and tweak any of its props and values
  2. Then run the plugin, and hit See my code to get a code snippet you can use in your Streamlit app!


If you need more help, check out our repository, which contains more thorough details and video examples.


Troubleshooting

If you hit any errors while using the plugin, make sure you check our troubleshooting guide in our repo, and if you’re still experiencing setbacks, file an issue and we’ll get back to you as soon as we can!Also, here are a few more resources that might be helpful for you:

  • Our Design System launch blog post, with instructions on how to use it;
  • This plugin's repository, containing the code for it, and video instructions on how to use it.


Have fun with it!

plugins.name: Colors Styles Switcher
plugins.description:
We Encourage Utilize the new Variables features instead of this plugin. for more information visit Figma Variables


Switch between your color palettes. This plug-in provides you with a simple way to switch between your themes.


How it works

When you add a new theme, all color styles and their properties, including the names and color values, are copied to the new theme, and any modifications made to the color styles are mirrored in the selected theme. As a result, each theme has a duplicate of your color styles with different color values. When you switch themes, the current theme will translate its own color values into Figma color styles, affecting any artboards that use your color styles.


Step by Step Guide

1. Add a new theme, and all your color styles from Figma will be copied to the new theme.

2. Repeat step number 1, but this time, feel free to change any color style via Figma to what fits your design.

3. Toggle between themes, the values of the color styles will change depending on the one you select.

plugins.name: Ultimate GIF Maker - Free Unlimited Exports
plugins.description:
The ultimate all-in-one GIF maker: import Figma frames, adjust frame delays and other settings, then export your GIF instantly to your computer. I use this to make all of my plugin preview GIF images.


How to Use

  1. Open the plugin, select Figma frames, then click "Import Frames."
  2. Reorder the GIF frames and customize the settings.
  3. Click "Download" to save the GIF file.


Features

  1. Individual Delay: Edit custom delay on each frame (100 = 1 second).
  2. Import Scale: Apply scale factor when importing selected frames (change in settings).
  3. Import Order: Sort the selected frames before importing them.
  4. Auto Order: Automatically sorted alphabetically by Frame names.
  5. Auto Delay: If an imported frame's name has d20 or d100, the delay is set to 20 or 100 automatically.
  6. Transparent Background: Paint your frame's background with any color (like pink #ff00ff) and enable Transparent Background, type ff00ff to replace pink color with empty color.
  7. Draggable: Click and drag GIF frames to swap the order
  8. Live Preview: Any change on the frames or settings will automatically change the GIF preview


Free Version

  1. Create unlimited GIFs.
  2. Export size is limited to 256px.
  3. Maximum of 8 frames per GIF.


Pro Version

One-time payment unlocks full access to:

  1. Create unlimited GIFs.
  2. Export up to 8K resolution.
  3. Unlimited frames per GIF.
  4. All future updates.

Click the FREE button to purchase the Pro version.


Credit

  1. Magnifier plugin in the preview image
  2. Chaos Pattern plugin in the preview image
  3. This plugin uses a modified version of gif.js by jnordberg.

accepted.name: Saranomy
accepted.description: I make premium Figma Plugins

plugins.tagline: Create animated GIFs from your frames and export it

plugins.name: Color Blender : Tints Generator
plugins.description:
Color Blender allows designers to effortlessly generate a variety of color tints based on a selected color. With customizable options for tint count, ellipse size, layout direction, and item spacing, this plugin empowers you to quickly explore and experiment with different color variations that will help you creating your style guide or design system foundation and enhance your design workflow by creating stunning tints in just a few clicks.


Instructions

  1. To get started run the plugin and use the color picker to choose the base color for generating tints.
  2. Optional: You can enter a name for the color, or leave it as the default "Primary".
  3. Optional: Set the desired number of tints to be generated. By default, 10 tints will be created.
  4. Optional: Modify the size of the ellipse shapes that represent the tints. The default size is 120 pixels.
  5. Choose the layout direction: Select whether the tints should be arranged horizontally or vertically.
  6. Optional: Adjust the spacing between the tints to control their visual arrangement. The default spacing is set to 32 pixels.
  7. Click "Create Tints": Generate the tints based on the selected color and configuration settings.


With ColorBlender, you can effortlessly create and explore a range of color tints, unlocking new possibilities for your design projects. Enjoy the flexibility and efficiency of generating beautiful color variations with just a few simple steps.


How to reach out and support

Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/in/desmismail/

Email: desmismail@gmail.com

Website: mohamed-ismail.com

accepted.name: Mohamed Ismail
accepted.description: Product Design Lead, Design Systems Advocate

plugins.name: What's your name?
plugins.description:
You're sick of using imaginary people in your designs with names like "John Doe"? So am I! I wanted a name generator that uses names from all over the world.


  • No selection: Generate name in new text node
  • Text node selection: replace existing text


Limitations

Currently there are some limitations in there are only chosen countries, only 5 names per country and there also may be bugs in the plugin overall. But I'm happy to improve!

Furthermore, I am aware that I do not address all people with the gender "male" and "female". A third option is being planned but I'm not sure yet how to implement it exactly, whether all languages can reflect it.


Data

The dataset of names was created with the help of an AI, so it may well contain errors. Please feel free to let me know! Also do you miss some specific country?

accepted.name: Franni
accepted.description:
Design System Designer |
BSc in Computer Science & MSc in Media Informatics.

Loving space operas, art and riding my bike. Part of the LGBTQIA+ community.

plugins.name: Design Board
plugins.description:
What

Interior designers use 3D/2D elevation renderings with callouts to specific design materials used. It's tedious to add the layout and then add the callouts, while keeping track of what materials are being used for specific clients.


How

Design board provides a way to simplify this workflow.

  1. Sync master list of items from google sheets
  2. Add/update/delete items from plugin (keeps sheet in sync)
  3. Choose items to add to layout
  4. Save active items back to sheets


Get started

  1. Clone the sheets template from sample sheet. The spreadsheet needs to have sheets named master and active to read/write items.
  2. Use https://designboard.destinationeichler.com/ to login and get credentials for google sheets access
  3. Login to plugin using the credentials and view your master items.
  4. Use a card template from this sample figma design. The elements in the template card need to be named as name, desc, qty-val, price-val, cost-val, img


NOTE - If you don't want to set up a sheet, use mock as the token name and the plugin will load with some test data.


Contact

Reach out to the team for bug fixes, feature requests use this form.
plugins.tagline: Integrate Google sheets with Figma for common Interior design workflows

plugins.name: Sankey Diagram : Chart made easy
plugins.description:
Captain Sankey for Figma is the ultimate solution for effortlessly creating Sankey diagrams within the Figma design environment.


☕ Buy Us a Coffee


Whether you're a data visualization enthusiast, a designer, or a professional seeking an intuitive and powerful tool, this plugin empowers you to craft insightful Sankey diagrams with ease.


Key Features:

  1. Create with data: Captain Sankey enables you to create Sankey diagrams from scratch within your Figma workspace. Start with a blank canvas or edit sample diagrams to suit your requirements.
  2. Import CSV Import node weights and colors via CSV files to streamline the diagram creation process. Effortlessly incorporate your data into the visualization.
  3. Orientation Options: Captain Sankey offers flexibility in orientation. Create Sankey diagrams either vertically or horizontally, allowing you to adapt the visualization to your project's specific needs.
  4. Customization: Tailor your Sankey diagram to your exact specifications. Adjust node connections, set custom weights, and choose from a range of color options, including user-defined colors, random colors, or two-tone gradients.
  5. Advanced Settings: Dive deeper into advanced settings that provide finer control over the diagram. Customize labels, transitions, and other elements for precision and clarity.
  6. Well-Organized Artboard: The Sankey diagrams created using this plugin are structured in an organized Figma artboard. This thoughtful layout makes it easy to further customize and integrate your diagrams into your design projects seamlessly.
  7. Text Component: A dedicated text component is included for straightforward text manipulation within your Sankey diagram. Adding, editing, or styling text has never been more accessible.


☕ Buy Us a Coffee: If "Sankey Diagram" has supercharged your design workflow and you'd like to show your support, consider buying us a coffee. Your support helps us keep "Sankey Diagram" free and continually improving.


☕ Buy Us a Coffee


Captain Sankey for Figma is your trusted companion for crafting data-driven visualizations and communicating complex concepts in a visually engaging manner. Your feedback is valuable as we continuously enhance this tool to meet your design and data visualization needs.


With Captain Sankey, your data storytelling just became a whole lot easier, intuitive, and visually impactful.
